title:
LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector, HD Ultra-thin, 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Pixel 8; fingerprint Compatible; Military-grade shatterproof; screen protection and camera lens protection;
original visual experience; high-response haptic touch
descriptions:
Simple protection for your Google Pixel 8.

What it is:
- A set of clear glass protectors for your phone. You get 2 screen protectors for the front and 2 small protectors for the camera on the back.
- Made to fit only the Google Pixel 8.

Why you’ll like it:
- Strong and safe: Tough tempered glass (called 9H hardness) helps stop scratches and cracks. It’s “military‑grade” shatterproof.
- Stays clear: High Definition glass keeps your screen and photos looking the same as without a protector.
- Easy to use: Thin glass keeps touch and typing smooth. Works with fingerprint unlock.
- Extra help at the edges: The edges are strengthened to prevent chips and peels.
- Protects the camera: The small back glass pieces stop scratches on your camera lenses.

What’s in the box:
- 2 front screen protectors.
- 2 camera lens protectors.
- Easy install tools (wipes and guides).

Support you can count on:
- Lifetime service. If you have a problem, customer support answers within 24 hours.

How to install (simple steps):
1) Wash and dry your hands. Turn off your phone.
2) Use the included wet wipe, then the dry wipe, to clean the screen. Do the same for the camera area.
3) Peel the backing from a screen protector. Line it up with the speaker and edges. Gently place it down. It will stick by itself. Press out any small bubbles with the cloth.
4) For the camera, peel the backing, line it up over the lenses, and press.
5) Turn your phone on and try the touch screen and fingerprint. If needed, redo using the second protector.

Good to know:
- If you ever get bubbles or dust, lift the protector gently by a corner, remove the particle with tape, and lay it back down.
- You have two sets, so you can replace later if one wears out.

Keep your Pixel 8 clear, sharp, and protected—without hassle.
